Translations.Text: Sil'noye muchitel'noye nakazaniye i gibel' tem, kto nastoychivo porochit lyudey slovami ili zhestami i oskvernyayet ikh chest'
kto nakopil ogromnoye sostoyaniye i raz za razom, naslazhdayas', podschityval yego iz-za lyubvi k nemu
On polagayet, chto eto bogatstvo prinesot yemu bessmertiye i izbavit yego ot lyubogo vreda v etoy zhizni
Pust' on uderzhivayetsya dumat' tak! Klyanus' Allakhom, chto iz-za yego nechestivogo deyaniya, on budet vvergnut v adskiy ogon', kotoryy unichtozhayet vso, chto brosheno v nego
Otkuda tebe znat', chto takoye sokrushayushchiy ogon'
Eto vosplamenonnyy ogon' Allakha, kotoryy po Yego veleniyu vechno budet razozhzhonnym
kotoryy doydot do serdets i okhvatit ikh
Oni, svyazannyye, budut zaperty v etom ogne i budut privyazany k vozdvignutym stolbam
i ne smogut dazhe poshevelit'sya, i ne budet im nikakogo spaseniya ot nego
